Class FooterNav

BaseWidget
  |
  +--FooterNav
public class FooterNav
extends BaseWidget

Use this class to render footer navigation that is displayed at the bottom of a page.

Author:
Walter A. Boring IV

$_css_file

private unknown $_css_file
The name of the css file for this class

$_company_name

private unknown $_company_name
the company name for the copyright statement.

$_date_string

private unknown $_date_string
The date string for the copyright statement. In form of "2001-1997", or "2001"

$_render_copyright

private unknown $_render_copyright
flag to tell us to render the copyright string or not. defaults to TRUE (or on)

$_legalnotice_url

private unknown $_legalnotice_url
url for the Legal statement. if this is non-null, we will render the "Legal Notice" link in the copyright header.

$_privacypolicy_url

private unknown $_privacypolicy_url
url for the privacy policy. If this is non-null, we will render the "Privacy Policy" link in the copyright header.

$_webmaster_email

private unknown $_webmaster_email
email address to contact web site maintainer.
